greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n, k) = Sum_{d|n} phi(d) * A008284(n/d, k) for n >= 1, T(0, 0) = 1. Triangle read by rows for 0 <= k <= n.
comment: Dirichlet convolution of phi(n) and A008284(n,k) for n >= 1. - _Richard L. Ollerton_, May 07 2021
program: def DivisorTriangle(f, T, Len, w = None):
r = lambda k: [f(d)*T(n//d,k) for d in divisors(n)]
if w != None: L = [*map(lambda v: v * w(n), L)]
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Aug 24 2019
